metadata.title: Ensure 'Minimum Length' is greater than or equal to 12

metadata.title: Ensure 'Minimum Uppercase Letters' is greater than or equal to 1

metadata.description: Ensure 'New Password Differs By Characters' is greater than or equal to 3

metadata.description: Ensure 'Prevent Password Reuse Limit' is set to 24 or more passwords
